com.ericdaugherty.mail.server.services.general
Class DeliveryService

java.lang.Object
  src.services.general.DeliveryService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigurationParameterContants
public class DeliveryService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigurationParameterContants

Handles the evalution of general mail delivery rules, including SMTP Relaying.
